channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom Share Buttons with Floating Sidebar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom Share Buttons with Floating Sidebar

item.title: CVE-2022-1717|2024-08-03T00:10:03.938Z -- unknown -- custom%20share%20buttons%20with%20floating%20sidebar
item.description: The Custom Share Buttons with Floating Sidebar WordPress plugin before 4.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
